      • setConstraintOrder

      • useEffect

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Damage>> useEffect​(Player shooter,
                                                                           Effect effect,
                                                                           java.util.List<Damage> forPotentiableWeapons,
                                                                           GameMap map,
                                                                           java.util.List<Player> players)
        Abstract method that will be overrode in the child-classes: it's the method that creates the possible alternatives of damages when using an effect
        Parameters:
        shooter - it's the player who is using the effect
        effect - it's the effect that is being used
        forPotentiableWeapons - it's an ArrayList containing all of the damages made by other effect (if the weapon is potentiable)
        map - it's the GameMap
        players - it's an ArrayList containing all of the Players in game
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all of the different alternatives of damages that can be done

      • computeMovement

        public java.util.ArrayList<Cell> computeMovement​(Effect effect,
                                                 Player shooter,
                                                 Player target,
                                                 Cell shooterPosition,
                                                 GameMap map)
        This method computes the possible movements of a target when shot by a weapon that can move the target
        Parameters:
        effect - it's the effect that is being used by the shooter
        shooter - it's the player who is shooting
        target - it's the target of the shot
        shooterPosition - it's the position from where the shooter is shooting
        map - it's the GameMap
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all the possible cells where the target can be moved

      • getMovementsFromDirections

        public static void getMovementsFromDirections​(Player target,
                                              GameMap box,
                                              java.util.List<Cell> possibleMovements,
                                              int distance)
        Helper method to compute the possible movements of a target when the effect can move it through a direction. Static because it is used also in the Newton powerup using process.
        Parameters:
        target - it's the target that can be moved.
        box - it's a clone of the original map.
        possibleMovements - it's the arrayList where the possibleMovements are stored.
        distance - it's the maximum distance at where the movement can be done.

      • recursiveMovementsEverywhere

        protected void recursiveMovementsEverywhere​(java.util.List<Cell> movements,
                                            java.lang.Integer distance,
                                            Player target,
                                            GameMap map)
        This method computes the possible movements of a target made by a weapon that has the ability to move players after the shot
        Parameters:
        movements - it's the ArrayList where the possible movements are stored
        distance - it's the recursive counter
        target - it's the Player who is being shot
        map - it's a map (not the game one) used for the recursion

      • computeDamages

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Damage>> computeDamages​(Effect effect,
                                                                          Player shooter,
                                                                          java.util.List<Player> forAdditionalEffects,
                                                                          GameMap map,
                                                                          java.util.List<Player> players)
        Computes the ArrayList of damages from the effect and the damage when the former only depends from distances and max number of players
        Parameters:
        effect - the effect that is being used
        shooter - the player who is using the effect
        forAdditionalEffects - it's an ArrayList containing all of the other damages that have been already made (null if there aren't)
        map - it's the GameMap
        players - it's an ArrayList containing all of the players in game
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all of the possible solutions of damages

      • computeDamageCanMoveBefore

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Damage>> computeDamageCanMoveBefore​(Effect effect,
                                                                                      Player shooter,
                                                                                      java.util.List<Damage> forAdditionalEffects,
                                                                                      GameMap map,
                                                                                      java.util.List<Player> players)
        Computes the ArrayList of damages when the effect that is being used has the ability to move players before attacking them
        Parameters:
        effect - it's the effect that is being used
        shooter - it's the player who is using the effect
        forAdditionalEffects - it's an ArrayList containing all of the other damages that have been already made (null if there aren't)
        map - it's the GameMap
        players - it's an ArrayList containing all of the players in game
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all of the possible solutions of damages

      • generateTargetsCombinations

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Player>> generateTargetsCombinations​(Effect e,
                                                                                    java.util.List<Player> p,
                                                                                    Player shooter,
                                                                                    GameMap map)
        Generates all of the possible targets combinations while using an effect (public for testing purposes)
        Parameters:
        e - it's the effect of analysis
        p - it's the ArrayList the potential targets
        shooter - it's the player who is using the weapon
        map - it's the GameMap
        Returns:
        an ArrayList with all the combinations

      • combinationsWithLowerValues

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> combinationsWithLowerValues​(int size,
                                                                                                                 int r)
        Returns the mathematical combination of a set of Integer, including all of the possible lenghts from zero to the max size (public for testing purposes)
        Parameters:
        size - size of the set to combine
        r - size of the biggest combinations to generate
        Returns:
        a HashMap containing the combinations and their indexes

      • effectsCombinations

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> effectsCombinations()
        Calculates the combinations of effects that can be chosen from the Player who is using the Weapon
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of effects combinations

        public abstract CommunicationMessage communicationMessageGenerator()
        Used to ask the message to return when using the weapon of the weapon.
        Returns:
        the message type that needs to be sent.
